sentences: Rolf Roosalu, also known as Rolf Junior (born 18 January 1982 in Tartu), is an Estonian singer who has participated in a number of musicals.
He has also, yet unsuccessfully, competed to represent Estonia at the Eurovision Song Contest six times (2008–13), with him most recently competing at Eesti Laul 2018.
In 2010, when the contest was held in Oslo, he announced the Estonian televoting results to the other countries.
In 2013, he did the same when the contest was held in Malmö.
